content: it is only one piece to shape the hat and ears so easy and quick to make i added a lot of step-by-step photos and tutorial videos to help you work through this project skill level beginner this pattern includes 5 sizes hat circumference approx from baby to adult 16 17 18 5 19 5 and 21 material worsted yarn hook us h8/ 5 0mm or any hook to obtain the gauge more patterns in my shops https //www etsy com/shop/cathyren http //www ravelry com/designers/cathy-ren http //www craftsy com/user/919070/pattern-store this pattern is copyrighted you may not rewrite resell or trade for more information please visit my shop policies https //www etsy com/shop/cathyren/policy
